function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shutdown of heat recovery and air circulation","Impact":"Significant increase in energy consumption, potential indoor environment parameter issues","Mitigation":"Optimize HVAC systems for energy efficiency, consider alternative ventilation methods","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, natural ventilation solutions","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, environmental authorities","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Unrealistic assumptions about the end of the pandemic peak","Impact":"Inadequate preparation for increased energy consumption, impact on environmental goals","Mitigation":"Review assumptions, consider alternative energy-saving measures","Technologies":"Energy management software, building automation systems","People":"Energy managers, environmental authorities","Owner":"Energy managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Increased heat demand for continuous ventilation","Impact":"Significant increase in operating costs, impact on financial budgets","Mitigation":"Implement energy-saving measures, optimize building design for ventilation efficiency","Technologies":"Building energy management systems, renewable energy solutions","People":"Facility managers, financial planners","Owner":"Building owners, financial planners"}]}
